My name is Benjy and I’m a user experience (UX) designer

I’ve been designing things for over 10 years. Right now, I work at Leadin and organise a design meet-up in Swansea. I have 2 kids, with one more on the way. When I’m not working, I like to spend time in The Great Outdoors or listening to music.

You might want to read my blog or find out a little more about me.
